name: ChefAlex
0:
”Alexa, open Chef Alex”
”Surprise me”
”I want to cook onion soup”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chef alex
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Main purpose of CHEF ALEX is enabling people to cook top-notch meals effortlessly. Adapting the recipe instructions - both audio and visual - up to people speed and cooking abilities. It’s like your personal cooking navigator, giving your step-by-step instructions all the way through to your desired top-notch meal destination


Engage CHEF ALEX when you decide to cook something under simple and careful guidance. CHEF ALEX provides you with explicit audio instructions at every step. No butter fingers on your smartphones anymore. No hurrying after a high-skilled individual on that fancy cooking video. No heavy cooking books falling from the counter right into your precious sauce. Just command CHEF ALEX to “repeat”, “show this again”, “go back to previous step” or “wait”. A number of different options are actually available when going through recipe - all for your effortless cooking. Once done - share your outstanding results or enjoy them in private, believe me, there will be something to enjoy!


What can a user do, or not do, with the skill?

User can: Search for recipe using predetermined filter options. Manage the progress through the recipe. [Repeat, wait, go back etc]. Get audio and/or visual guidance. Share the results and feedback.

User cannot: at the moment user cannot order anything through the skill such as ingredients, kitchen utensils etc.


What information is the person expected to have available?

1st version available now: What the person wants to cook.

2nd version: Based on ingredients available come up with a suggestion.

3rd version: Based on calendar and scheduled events suggests recipe and probably even ordering certain ingredients through integrated in-skill-purchase.

Further: work-about of wellbeing seems to be feasible. Healthy diet / sport routine support. Meals scheduled - ingredients ordered. Stock / fridge management and control. Water consumption control. Healthy - delicious life balance.


What are the ways a user can invoke the skill?

Ask, call, let’s cook, wake up etc.


What features directly support the purpose?

Ability to go through the recipe by steps (embedded recipe database). ability to manage the guidance along the way (repeat, wait, etc).
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
